m_szDocTitle: Hydrogen cars have a 'chicken or egg' problem in New England - News and reviews - Boston.com
m_szDocSumamry: Previous -- of -- Next BMW i8. With swan-wing doors and a shark-nose grille, the i8 plug-in hybrid is a truly eye-catching vehicle. Its fuel economy is just under 30 combined mpg -- not bad for a supercar, and its speed tops out at 155 mph. It starts at $141,695. Ryan Breslin/Boston.com Previous -- of -- Next Subaru XV Crosstrek Hybrid. With high fuel efficiency and low emissions, the Crosstrek Hybrid delivers sleek styling and road-gripping symmetrical all-wheel drive. It has a 31 combined mpg.
